data.text:
2017-18 Women's Lacrosse Roster

Choose a Player:

10 Alexandra Higgins

Position D

Height 5-5

Class Senior

Hometown Hamburg, NY

Prev School Hamburg

Major Marketing

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

Why Niagara?

"Niagara is a beautiful campus with small class sizes. I also knew I wanted to play lacrosse in college and I think it is a perfect fit for me."

2017 Season

Named the 2017 MAAC Defender of the Year and was a unanimous selection to the All-MAAC First Team at defense...Started all 19 games in her junior season...Set Niagara single-season program records with 58 ground balls, 111 draw controls, and 37 caused turnovers, all career-high marks...Average of 5.84 draw controls per game was 11th in the NCAA and stands as the second highest single-season average in MAAC history...Ranked third in the MAAC with 3.05 ground balls per game (24th in the NCAA) and 1.95 caused turnovers per game (28th NCAA) as a junior...Career-high 14 draw controls at Quinnipiac (4/23)...Recorded season-high five ground balls in four straight games (4/4-4/15)...Career-high five caused turnovers vs. Monmouth (4/15), adding five ground balls and five draw controls.

2016 Season

Named All-MAAC Second Team following her sophomore campaign...Started 17 of 18 appearances...Led Niagara and ranked fourth in the MAAC with 64 draw controls...Added 30 ground balls and 13 caused turnovers...Season-high seven draw controls vs. Mount St. Mary's (3/18)...Collected five ground balls, six draw controls, and four caused turnovers vs. Iona (4/9).

2015 Season

Played in all 18 games as a freshman in 2015, making five starts...Was third on the team with 25 draw controls and fourth with 25 ground balls...Caused eight turnovers in 2015...Collected a season-high six draw controls vs. Monmouth (3/24).

Personal

Born in Buffalo, NY...Daughter of Jerry and Christina Higgins...Has three siblings, Julia, Nick and Sean...Majoring in marketing.
